<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/security/administrator"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Checks if the selected user is an administrator of a product with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"productid","in":"query","description":"The ID of the product extracted from the query parameters.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"aae1e103-bca5-9fa1-ba8c-42058b4abf28"}},{"name":"userid","in":"query","description":"The user ID extracted from the query parameters.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"aae1e103-bca5-9fa1-ba8c-42058b4abf28"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Object with the user security information: product ID, user ID, administrator or not","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"object","properties":{"productId":{"type":"string","description":"The product ID.","format":"uuid","example":"aae1e103-bca5-9fa1-ba8c-42058b4abf28"},"userId":{"type":"string","description":"The user unique identifier.","format":"uuid","example":"aae1e103-bca5-9fa1-ba8c-42058b4abf28"},"administrator":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the user has administrator privileges for the product.","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The product administrator parameters.","title":"ProductAdministratorDto"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"ProductAdministratorWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
